column6: It's the beginning of the end of the world for the Gods of Asgard, and only Thor and his Avengers allies might be able to stave off that fate -- but does the god of thunder even want to? THE GROUNDWORK IS LAID HERE FOR THIS SUMMER'S AVENGERS EVENT, BEGINNING NEXT MONTH IN AVENGERS #500!
column7: | Avengers | Captain America | Iron Man | Thor
column8: | penciller (cover):Steve Epting | writer:Mike Avon Oeming | colorist:Laura Villari | penciller:Andrea Di Vito
